verses.name: Psalms 131:1
verses.text: Lord, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.

verses.name: Psalms 131:2
verses.text: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.

verses.name: Psalms 131:3
verses.text: Let Israel hope in the Lord from henceforth and for ever.
